entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -38.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 11:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -38.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -42.5°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
